thread.title: howard mann

author: howard mann
title: howard mann
text: I had a problem with one of my seating and contacted the company. John J.responded almost immediately and couldn't have been nicer and more friendly in the email communication. John addressed the problem and came up with a solution right away. It is not possible for me to be more satisfied and would recommend this company to anyone. Super happy customer. Thanks John
